attributes.additional_details:
Make It That All Uk Citizens  Do  Time Serving There Country By Serving In National  Service for 5 Years
With Age Of Conscription  18 To 50 Year Old ,

As It Will Be Good For The Making Of People
Into Good Citizens Of This Country  Of Who  Sign On For To Serve  National service in The Armed Forces

By Signing Up for 5 Years
And Swearing A oath of  allegiance to The Country And Its People To Protect and to serve this country From All Enemys Foreign And Demestic ,
